content.html: Ok, here it is. A slow reply to @chriscoyier's RSS post, and a test of my new webmentions setup. Am I on the IndieWeb Yet? (Even if mentions work, they won't display yet. I wasn't happy doing a theoretical layout of content I don't yet grok.) miriamsuzanne.com/2022/06/04/ind…
content.value:
Ok, here it is. A slow reply to @chriscoyier's RSS post, and a test of my new webmentions setup. 

Am I on the IndieWeb Yet?

(Even if mentions work, they won't display yet. I wasn't happy doing a theoretical layout of content I don't yet grok.)

miriamsuzanne.com/2022/06/04/ind…
